text:
Mark Wahlberg Opens Up About His Daughter Dating and It’s as Awkward as You’d Imagine

Mark Wahlberg is trying to play it as cool as he can when it comes to watching his kids grow up before his very eyes. The actor stopped by The Graham Norton Show this week and opened up…

http://ift.tt/2rAw6ZY
